CREATE TABLE films(
   id 			  int 		 NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT
  ,original_title         VARCHAR(83) NOT NULL 
  ,release_year           INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,genre                  VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL
  ,duration               INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,country                VARCHAR(115) NOT NULL
  ,language               VARCHAR(106) NOT NULL
  ,director               VARCHAR(46) NOT NULL
  ,writer                 VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL
  ,production_company     VARCHAR(63) NOT NULL
  ,description            VARCHAR(383) NOT NULL
  ,avg_vote               NUMERIC(2,1) NOT NULL
  ,votes                  INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,budget                 VARCHAR(15)
  ,usa_gross_income       INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,worldwide_gross_income BIGINT  NOT NULL
  ,metascore              INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,reviews_from_users     INTEGER  NOT NULL
  ,reviews_from_critics   INTEGER  NOT NULL
);
